description:
Beat the wintery forecase in warm, water-repellent cycling tights. The PI Dry technology sheds moisture throughout the lifespan of the garment, and the stretchy fleece keeps your leg muscles warm while you power through your hill climbs. Zipperless legs increase durability and comfort.

  • Moisture shedding PI Dry Thermal Fleece is warm, breathable and wicks away excess moisture
  • Water resistant DWR treatment is applied to individual fibers, not the surface of the garment
  • Reduced seams and stretchy fabric for fit and comfort
  • Elite Escape 1:1® Chamois for all-day comfort
  • Silicone grippers keep hems in place
  • Reflective elements for low light visibility
name: Pearl Izumi Thermal Cycling Tights - Men's
